P/N: 593720-001 (593722-B21) *[[HP NC366T]] (811546-B21) - 4x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Intel]] i350 *[[HP NC373T]] (394791-B21) - 1x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Intel]] i82543GC *[[HP NC380T]] - 2x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCIe, [[Broadcom]] BCM5706 *[[HP 535T]] (813661-B21) - 2x 10GbE, PCIe, [[Broadcom]] BCM57416 *[[HP 561T]] (716591-B21) - 2x 10GbE, PCIe 3.0, [[Intel]] X540 *[[HP 562T]] (817738-B21) - 2x 10GbE, PCIe 3.0, [[Intel]], Gen10 *[[HP NC7170]] - 2x 1GbE (RJ-45), PCI/PCI-X, [[Intel]] i82546 [[Category:English Documentation]]
